title: What are the good resources to teach kids Python? - Quora

response.answer_text: You can check out books or Youtube tutorials, but I suggest checking out a coding platform like Coding Elements. About The Course: It is a LIVE Online Course that can be taken from home. A dedicated mentor is there for the child. The syllabus includes the Fundamentals of Programming like Data Types, Variables, Loops, Data Structures. It also includes Web Automation, Data Science (Numpy, Matplotlib, Statistics, etc). and Machine Learning and is adjusted based on the counselling session. The course helps the child develop various skills like Creative Thinking, Abstract Thinking, Problem Solving, Logic, and Clear Communication. These skills have a positive impact on the child’s academics and overall performance in life. The curriculum has a lot of projects related to the concepts the child is going to learn. These projects keep the child occupied and also help him develop his creative thinking as well as problem-solving skills. Live Programming Courses | Coding Classes | Coding Elements
